PHRASE.LANG:
Ever fancied yourself a study where you can sit down and work on those reports (overdue or not?). MyOffice allows you to do just that!
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) MyOffice - Desk
 (2) MyOffice - Filing Unit
 (3) MyOffice - Single - Storage Unit
 (4) MyOffice - Single - Countertop Unit
 (5) MyOffice - Single - Desk Height Cabinet
 (6) MyOffice - Double - Storage Unit
 (7) MyOffice - Double - Countertop Unit
 (8) MyOffice - Double - Desk Height Cabinet
 (9) MyOffice - Corner - Storage Unit
 (10) MyOffice - Corner - Desk Height Cabinet
 (11) MyOffice - Corner - Desk
 (12) MyOffice - Tall Robe
 (13) MyOffice - Waste Bin - Chrome
 (14) MyOffice - Desk Chair - Brown
 (15) MyOffice - Desk Lamp [#Legal]
